faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button at the top right and follow the prompts to create your account.

faqs.question: Can I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Yes, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset it.

faqs.question: How do I update my profile information?
faqs.answer: Visit 'Profile Settings' to edit your information. Changes are saved automatically.

faqs.question: Where can I report bugs or issues?
faqs.answer: Select 'Bug Report' in the feedback form or contact support through our help center.

faqs.question: How do I request new features?
faqs.answer: Submit a 'Feature Request' in the feedback form or share ideas in our community forum.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Manage your payment options in 'Billing'.
